Cardassian spie are masters of undercover operations. In
2371, Miles O'Brien was framed by a surgically altered
Cardassian posing as retired Starfleet officer Raymond Boone.

Plays on any Federation mission. Your Cardassian
personnel may now attempt this mission. Discard
after mission completed.

Cardassians have long been suspicious of the Klingon Empire.
The unprovoked Klingon invasion of 2372 demonstrated the
need to step up the Union's intelligence-gathering activities.

Plays on any Klingon mission. Your Cardassian
personnel may now attempt this mission. Discard after
mission completed.

name: Espionage: Romulan on Bajoran

personnel may now attempt this mission. Discard after

Diligent adherence to landing procedures is crucial to the

staffing requirements may use 1 RANGE to land or take
